channel.title: Shell task failed, exit value: 1 (Windows 10)
channel.description:
Hi all, it is my first day with axoloti. Everything was ok, but I have a problem ...
I try to run some tutorial or demo but don't work ...
SYSTEM: Windows 10 Home 64 bits
AXOLOTI: WIN 1.0.8
MESSAGE:
Generate code complete Start creating directory on sdcard : /01_sine_oscillator creating dir: /01_sine_oscillator Axoloti says: file error: FR_NOT_ENABLED, filename:"/01_sine_oscillator" Done creating directory Changing working directory on sdcard : /01_sine_oscillator Change working directory: /01_sine_oscillator Axoloti says: file error: FR_NOT_ENABLED, filename:"/01_sine_oscillator" Done changing working directory Start compiling patch "make" no se reconoce como un comando interno o externo, programa o archivo por lotes ejecutable. shell task failed, exit value: 1 Compiling patch failed ( C:\Users\NEL\Documents\axoloti\axoloti-factory\patches\tutorials\01_sine_oscillator.axp )
many thanks!

item.title: Shell task failed, exit value: 1 (Windows 10)
item.dc:creator: @Xelar
item.description:
@Xelar wrote:

yes! is true! now works! many thanks @thetechnobear

Read full topic

item.title: Shell task failed, exit value: 1 (Windows 10)
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Xelar:

"make" no se reconoce como un comando interno o externo,

this looks like you have not installed the runtime

Read full topic

item.title: Shell task failed, exit value: 1 (Windows 10)
item.dc:creator: @Xelar
item.description:
@Xelar wrote:

Hi all, it is my first day with axoloti. Everything was ok, but I have a problem ...

I try to run some tutorial or demo but don't work ...

SYSTEM: Windows 10 Home
64 bits

AXOLOTI: WIN 1.0.8

MESSAGE:

Generate code complete
Start creating directory on sdcard : /01_sine_oscillator
creating dir: /01_sine_oscillator
Axoloti says: file error: FR_NOT_ENABLED, filename:"/01_sine_oscillator"
Done creating directory
Changing working directory on sdcard : /01_sine_oscillator
Change working directory: /01_sine_oscillator
Axoloti says: file error: FR_NOT_ENABLED, filename:"/01_sine_oscillator"
Done changing working directory
Start compiling patch
"make" no se reconoce como un comando interno o externo,
programa o archivo por lotes ejecutable.
shell task failed, exit value: 1
Compiling patch failed ( C:\Users\NEL\Documents\axoloti\axoloti-factory\patches\tutorials\01_sine_oscillator.axp )

many thanks!

Read full topic
